com.example.myapplication

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.example.myapplication.DatabaseHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class DatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    DatabaseHelper DatabaseHelper extenduje SQLiteOpenHelper a reprezentuje triedu na pracu s SQLite databazov stara sa o otvorenie databazy a komunikaciu s nou.
